Podax was created by Dan Goldstein. You can email me at dan@axelby.com with any comments or questions you have.

Podax is open source software. You can get the source code at http://github.com/thasmin/Podax. It is available under the 2 clause BSD license. The libraries used are ActionBarSherlock, ViewPagerIndicator and drag-sort-listview.

Podax collects your subscription list to create the list of popular subscriptions from Podax users. No personal information of any kind is stored. The technique used can be found under "Tracking Installations" on this web page.

Thanks for using Podax! You\'re almost ready to enter the blossoming world of podcasts. All you need to do is subscribe to a podcast and Podax will do the rest. Visit the RSS link in the browser, type the RSS feed URL below, or choose one of our favorite podcasts below.
This American Life is a weekly podcast that tells interesting stories in otherwise mundane situations. It has won all of the major broadcasting awards.

Tom Merritt brings you "Tech News Today" with co-hosts Sarah Lane (TechTV, Revision3), Iyaz Akhtar (PC Mag, TechVi) and others. Get up to speed, with a fun and friendly ride through the need-to-know tech news of the day.

Version 5.9

  • Changed notification so it has actions
  • Fixed widget action when queue is empty
  • Fixed bug where time left in podcast was negative
  • Fixed a few minor crash bugs
  • Updated Riasel RSS parser library

Version 5.8

  • Fixed podcasts that have donate links
  • Added configuration options to subscriptions
    • Rename subscriptions
    • Do not automatically put new podcasts in the queue
    • Automatically remove podcasts from queue after 7 or 14 days

Version 5.7

  • Fixed automatic pausing and resuming

Version 5.6

  • Atom feeds
  • Properly stops during phone calls
  • Fixed crashes when the phone can\'t play the podcast file

Version 5.5

  • Fixed Queue operations
  • Fixed bug where podcast would resume playing after a random notification

Version 5.4

  • Added data usage explanation to About
  • Added changelog
  • Fixed bugs that were causing crashes
